channel.title: Half Life Singularity Collapse - New Half Life Fanfilm
channel.description:
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EVeSA9xkufQ&feature=player_embedded#at=489[/url]
Pretty well made.
The ending is just :awesome:

item.title: Half Life Singularity Collapse - New Half Life Fanfilm
item.dc:creator: Slowpokes_Bro
item.description:
This makes me think of how awesome a HL movie would be if it were done right. This short film is pretty good in the action scenes. Some parts are a little corny, but it was enjoyable, a lot more than Beyond Black Mesa actually.

Edit Also on the part with Freeman, while I admit it was corny as well, I actually thought that was really epic. Would’ve indeed been more epic had they an actual guy dress as him walking closer in that same manner, but I think that might’ve been my favorite part.

Read full topic

item.title: Half Life Singularity Collapse - New Half Life Fanfilm
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
I didn’t even bother to watch the full video. I was far too bored of it after 4 minutes.

MarshmallowRadiation:

He has visible implants and several tubes coming out of his torso. I think the surgery was complete. If it wasn’t, I guess the surgeons took their mid-surgery coffee break.

I’m only guessing that it’s incomplete based off of the unreliable propaganda graffiti.

389×558 35.7 KB

Read full topic

item.title: Half Life Singularity Collapse - New Half Life Fanfilm
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
lithium.bb:

Or they went off to try and kill Freeman, like the rest of the Combines there

surgeons?

I doubt the surgery was being done by any ex-human anyway.

It was probably a bunch of robotic arms and shit.

Maybe the guy laying there was recovering from surgery?

Read full topic

item.title: Half Life Singularity Collapse - New Half Life Fanfilm
item.dc:creator: MarshmallowRadiation
item.description:
Dias:

If you’re referring to the stripped soldier in Nova Prospekt, there’s really no way of knowing if that was before or after surgery was complete.

He has visible implants and several tubes coming out of his torso. I think the surgery was complete. If it wasn’t, I guess the surgeons took their mid-surgery coffee break.

item.description:
X_Mastershot_X:

I believe once you had the surgery done you can’t survive without the suit .

EDIT: nvm they can

item.title: Half Life Singularity Collapse - New Half Life Fanfilm
item.dc:creator: lithium.bb
item.description:
X_Mastershot_X:

There are some stupid parts like “the freeman part” but overall very impressive. I don’t understand how the man was able to move on without combine soldier suit after the surgery.

He hadn’t had the suit on to begin with, only the surgery had taken place so far.
